name: I Am Whitebeard!!!
text: [Main] If your Leader has the {Whitebeard Pirates} type, play up to 1 [Edward.Newgate] from your hand. Then, you may add the top or bottom card of your Life cards into your hand. If you did, give up to 1 of your Leader +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
